Sentencas: In this study, a data-driven fault diagnosis method was developed for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: First, the complete experimental data was obtained following the design of the SOFC system experiments.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: Then, principal component analysis (PCA) was performed to reduce the dimensionality of the obtained experimental data.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: Finally, the fault diagnosis algorithms were designed by support vector machine (SVM) and BP neural network to identify and prevent the reformer carbon deposition and heat exchanger rupture faults, respectively.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: The research results show that both SVM and BP fault diagnosis algorithms can achieve online fault identification.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: The PCA + SVM algorithm was compared with the SVM algorithm, BP algorithm, and PCA + BP algorithm, and the results show that the PCA + SVM algorithm is superior in terms of running time and accuracy, the diagnosis accuracy reached more than 99%, and the running time was within 20 s.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: The corresponding system optimization scheme is also proposed.
Titulo: A Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems
